card.name: Skullclamp

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

card.name: Mystical Tutor
card.property: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The student searches the world for meaning. The master finds worlds of meaning in the search.

card.name: Trinisphere
card.property: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {2}{B} to cast instead.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Designed to restrain petty thoughts, but used to repress entire empires.

card.name: Balance
card.property: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

card.name: Serendib Efreet
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Summoners of efreeti remember only the power of command, never the sting of regret.

card.name: Sensei's Divining Top
card.property: {1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Channel
card.property: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To some mages, the meaning of life is less important than how much is left.

card.name: Goblin Lackey
card.property: Whenever Goblin Lackey deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the first sign of enemy scouts, Jula grinned and strapped on his diplomacy helmet.

card.name: Kird Ape
card.property: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.

card.name: Lotus Petal
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

card.name: Berserk
card.property: Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

card.name: Necropotence
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Strip Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominaria itself a casualty of war.

card.name: Tinker
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Tinker, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What separates us from mere beasts is the capacity for self-improvement."

card.name: Gifts Ungiven
card.property: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
